sentences.sContent: The iris of the eye is photographed from up to one meter away.
sentences.sContent_eng: The iris of the eye is photographed from up to one meter away.
sentences.sCn: 眼睛的虹膜最远可在一公尺外的距离接受摄影。

sentences.sContent: The patterns of the iris are translated into digital code, and stored in a PC database, along with personal information.
sentences.sContent_eng: The patterns of the iris are translated into digital code, and stored in a PC database, along with personal information.
sentences.sCn: 虹膜的图案转译为数码，然后与个人资料一起储存在个人计算机数据库里。

sentences.sContent: This small move creates better balance with the iris and pupil of each eye and eliminates the tension on the left eye against the left edge of her face.
sentences.sContent_eng: This small move creates better balance with the iris and pupil of each eye and eliminates the tension on the left eye against the left edge of her face.
sentences.sCn: 这样小小的移动创造了更好的平衡，包括虹膜、瞳孔和每一只眼睛，消除了左眼对她脸部边缘的压迫感。

phrases.pCn: 彩虹光圈；[摄]可变光圈（等于iris）

remMethod.val: 本身为词根， 意为“彩虹； 虹膜”

trans.tranOther: the round coloured part of your eye, that surrounds the black  pupil
